definition: tuba/large size (clothes, print etc)/(polite) (your) name/(coll.) number two/to defecate
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: The large print makes for  easier reading.
Lo: A king-sized bed sounds great.
Avoid the use of large text and icons.
sentences.chinese: 避免使用大号文本和图标。

sentences.english: I stayed in the largest of the 3 -suite with king bed.
sentences.chinese: 我入住的是其中最大的一个套间带有特大号床。

sentences.english: Please super-size my meal, I am ver hungry.
sentences.chinese: 给我来一份特大号的快餐，我很饿。

sentences.english: Dress sizes range from petite to extra large.
sentences.chinese: 服装尺码从特小号到特大号不等。

sentences.english: And “outsize fiscal deficits” suggest that fiscal stimulus may also be exhausted.
sentences.chinese: “特大号财政赤字”也暗示财政刺激可能也气数将近。

sentences.english: Heat 2 tablespoons oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat.
sentences.chinese: 取一只大号不粘锅，用中高火加热2汤匙油。

sentences.english: Fastfood: What size fries do you want?
At the end, he bought a large-sized purple coloured silk shirt.
sentences.chinese: 最后，他买了一件大号的紫色真丝新衬衫。

sentences.english: To leg bag when ambulatory. To larger bedside drainage bag at night.
sentences.chinese: 移动时使用附腿尿袋夜间使用大号引流袋。

sentences.english: Please give me a large Mocha.
sentences.chinese: 请给我一个大号摩卡咖啡。

sentences.english: I recognized the mender who recommended me to seize the large-sized prize.
sentences.chinese: 我认出了那个建议我占有大号奖品的修理工。

sentences.english: The book was in large print.
sentences.chinese: 这本书是用大号铅字印的。

sentences.english: I'm expecting one of those crimes, something big, to fall into my lap.
sentences.chinese: 我在等待案件，说不定那特大号的案子会落在我手上。

sentences.english: Perhaps eating a big salad before you begin baking is a good idea.
sentences.chinese: 在开始烘培前吃份大号沙拉也许是个好办法。

definition: trumpet/small size (clothes etc)/(coll.) number one/to urinate/(humble) our store
second (unit of time)/arc second (angular measurement unit)/(coll.) instantly
(coll.) piece of light artillery such as a mortar/(fig.) person who speaks boldly and frankly/hot hatch (car)/(also used figuratively with various meanings in other contexts)
to confine/to lock up/to pen in
circle/ring/loop/classifier for loops, orbits, laps of race etc/CL:個|个[ge4]/to surround/to circle
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
mini (as in mini-skirt or Mini Cooper) (loanword)
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
